sklarpy.tests.copulas package

Submodules

sklarpy.tests.copulas.conftest module

sklarpy.tests.copulas.helpers module

sklarpy.tests.copulas.helpers.get_dist(name: str, copula_params_dict: dict, mdists: MarginalFitter, data: ndarray = None) → tuple[source]

Fits a copula model to data.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the copula as in distributions_map.

  • copula_params_dict (dict) – Dictionary of containing the copula parameters.

  • mdists (MarginalFitter) – Fitted MarginalFitter object containing the univariate marginals.

  • data (np.ndarray) – Multivariate data to fit the copula too if its params are not specified in copula_params_dict.

Returns:

res – non-fitted copula, fitted copula, copula-parameters for fitted copula.

Return type:

tuple
